location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'The Shatt al-arab portion of the Perso-Iraqi frontier as fixed in 1913-14 and amended in 1937'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed in paper. Dimension: 490 x 440 mm

mods.abstract: Map showing two views of the Shatt al-Arab portion of the Perso-Iraqi Frontier. The first view shows a more general view of the frontier between Persia and the Iraqi border around Basra, including the Persian Gulf. The second view shows in more detail the Abadan Island zone. The scale of the first view is approximately 1:256,851, and the scale of the second view is approximately 1:126,221.
